panels.description: Status of the services running on NAS
panels.title: Service status

targets.query: SELECT (last("QTS.systemTotalMem") - last("QTS.systemAvailableMem"))  FROM "snmp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Enclosure temperature limited to the first enclosure with ID=0.
panels.title: Enclosure temperature

targets.query: SELECT last("QTS.systemTotalMem") - last("QTS.systemAvailableMem")  FROM "snmp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iops") FROM "snmp.QNAP.diskPerformanceTable" WHERE ("blvID" = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(20s), "blvID"
